Package tage

The TAGE core game engine classes.
Author:
Scott Gordon
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Camera
    A Camera specifies the rendering viewpoint for a Viewport.
    CameraOrbit3D
    A CameraOrbit3D class.
    DisplaySettingsDialog
    This class provides a dialog box for specifying display settings.
    Engine
    The Engine object holds references to the primary game engine components, and provides accessors for them.
    GameObject
    GameObject holds the data associated with a node in the scenegraph.
    HUDmanager
    Manages up to two HUD strings, implemented as GLUT strings.
    Light
    Holds light information that can be modified by the game application.
    LightManager
    Manages storage of Lights to facilitate sending them to shaders.
    NodeController
    Abstract class for scenegraph node controllers.
    ObjShape
    ObjShape holds the raw vertex data for an object.
    RenderQueue
    Builds a render queue by traversing the GameObjects as specified in the scenegraph tree.
    RenderStates
    Holds all render states for a given object.
    RenderSystem
    Manages the OpenGL setup and rendering for each frame.
    SceneGraph
    Tools for building a scene graph tree, and building and applying the associated node controllers.
    TextureImage
    TextureImage holds all raw data associated with a particular texture image.
    Utils
    Shader and graphics utilities used by the engine.
    VariableFrameRateGame
    A game application should extend this class.
    Viewport
    One viewport covering a portion of the GLCanvas, and an associated camera.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Light.LightType
